thread.section_title: Federal Judge In Detroit Orders Trump Administration To Halt Enforcement Of Immigration Restrictions – CBS Detroit
thread.title: Federal Judge In Detroit Orders Trump Administration To Halt Enforcement Of Immigration Restrictions
thread.title_full: Federal Judge In Detroit Orders Trump Administration To Halt Enforcement Of Immigration Restrictions

author: sstoddart
title: Federal Judge In Detroit Orders Trump Administration To Halt Enforcement Of Immigration Restrictions

organizations.name: detroit orders trump administration to halt enforcement of immigration restrictions detroit

text:
DETROIT (WWJ) – A federal judge in Detroit has ordered the Trump Administration to temporarily stop enforcement of its recently announced immigration restrictions.
U.S. District Judge Victoria Roberts issued the order on Friday.
Click here to read the motion (.pdf format)
Stay with WWJ Newsradio 950 and CBSDetroit.com for the latest.
